survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on smartphone battery performance, charging habits, and satisfaction levels to help manufacturers improve product design.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your current smartphone?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the battery life of your current smartphone?

questions.question_text: How often do you need to recharge your smartphone during a typical day?
questions.client_notes: Provide clear frequency options. Consider adding 'Not applicable' if needed.

questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option for unspecified factors.
